PERSONA:
james is a 67-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region. he has some college education with an associate's degree and was born in the united states. james identifies as a very conservative protestant republican and a born-again or evangelical christian, though he never attends religious services.

despite being retired, james has a comfortable middle-income family with an annual income between $90,000 and $100,000. he is a registered voter who leans towards the republican party and holds very conservative ideological views. james is an active volunteer in his community and is almost constantly using the internet.

while he may come across as traditional and set in his ways, james is deeply patriotic and takes his civic duties seriously. he values hard work, self-reliance, and traditional family values. in his free time, james likely enjoys outdoor activities, spending time with his grandchildren, and staying informed on current events and politics.
